name: The Heir Apparent's Mistake
description: The son of the former boss robs a card game.
context: Jackie Jr., the son of your late mentor Jackie Aprile Sr., robbed a high-stakes card game and shot a made man (Furio) in the process. Standard protocol is death. However, you promised his father on his deathbed that you'd keep his son out of the life.
prompt: If you let Jackie Jr. live, you look weak to your captains. If you kill him, you break your promise to a dead friend and his mother, Ro. What is the call?
